subject: Race and Ethnicity
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Carlotta Ferlito posted an apology on Twitter after making a racist comment aimed at an American rival, Simone Biles, who is black, at the world championships in Belgium.
snippet: Carlotta Ferlito posted an apology on Twitter after making a racist comment aimed at an American rival, Simone Biles, who is black, at the world championships in Belgium.
